Name: Reef Rumble
About the game: Take control of your custom jellyfish and battle with your friends in highly dynamic physic-based fights, for fun or to see who is the best. Step into the ring for 2 to 4 players clashes. Pierce the weak spot of your opponents using submarine dangers to eliminate them and score points to become the ruler of the reefs! Multiplayer arena battles, from 2 to 4 players. Explosive, tactical and physics based combats. A really easy to play game for new players, but hard to master for experienced ones. Cute customizable little jellyfishes. Several gamemodes and loads of gameplay settings possible.
